revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 81:;Epeiph 20:;Sarapion, son of Apollonios, grandson of Harpagathes, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Pasion, son of Petheus, grandson of Sambathion, mother Tathautis, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Petalos, grandson of Petaus, mother Taeuhemeros, drachmas 8;;Chairemon, son of Chairemon, grandson of Sambas, mother Sokratiaine, drachmas 8 copper drachmas 4;;Leonides, son of Phanomgeus (Petalos, son of Kapparis);;(in left margin: drachmas 16 obols 8) orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 3 obols 2, tax on the produce of olives obols 3, naubion obols 2, surcharges obols 5;;eparourion drachmas 2 obol 1.5, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, he paid Pharmouthi 28, in total drachmas 7 obols 3.5;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 8 obols 2, surcharges obols 3 chalki 2, in total drachmas 8 obols 5 chalki 2;;and Philous, daughter of Teberis;;orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachma 1 obol 1.5, tax on the produce of olives obol 1 chalki 2, naubion obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 3 obols 5;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 3 obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 3 obols 2;;Pnepheros, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Tapetheus, copper drachmas 4 obols 28;;Pasion, son of Sambas, grandson of Phaesis, mother Aphrodite, drachmas 20 obols 20 copper drachma 1 obols 8;;Didymos, son of Satabous, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tanomgeus, copper drachmas 4 obols 28;;Ninis, son of Asklas, grandson of Ninis, mother Tabous, drachmas 4;;Didymos, son of Heron, grandson of Heras, mother Tasiaipis, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Agathos Daimon, grandson of Petheus, mother Stiynchis, obols 28;;(in left margin: drachmas 52 obols 14) Phanomgeus, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Horion (Turbon, son of Titinsambas);;orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 13 obol 0.5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obols 5 chalki 2, naubion drachma 1 obols 2, surcharges drachmas 3 obols 1.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 8 obols 4.5, surcharges obols 5 chalki 2, kollybos obols 3, in total drachmas 29 obols 4.5;;Sarapion, son of Sambas;;orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4 chalki 2, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;and to Herakleides, son of Leonides;;orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4 chalki 2, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2;;Lupus, son of Horos, grandson of Menches, mother Tapapeis, drachmas 8;;Herieus, son of Sambas, grandson of Peteesis, mother Tapapeis, drachmas 4;;Maron, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Sambathion, mother Taseus, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Herieus, mother Anthia, copper drachmas 4;;Kastor alias Sabeinos, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Satabous, mother Melidous, drachmas 4;;Sisois, son of Naaraus the younger, grandson of Theabennis, mother Thaisas, copper drachma obols 28;;(in left margin: drachmas 8 obols 8) orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachma 1 obols 4, tax on the produce of olives obol 1.5, naubion obol 1, surcharges obols 2.5;;eparourion drachma 1 obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 3 obols 5;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 4 obol 1, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 4 obols 2.5 chalki 2.";Sambas, son of Petheus (Sarouanitis);;(in left margin: drachmas 8 obols 8) orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachma 1 obols 4, tax on the produce of olives obol 1.5, naubion obol 1, surcharges obols 2.5;;eparourion drachma 1 obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 3 obols 5;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 4 obol 1, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 4 obols 2.5 chalki 2."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- CPJ 3, 492 (lines with Sambathion) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
